review: He is very approachable, it was a good experience, the treatment worked. I would rate 10/10 he was not in a hurry. He listens to the problems I visited him twice a day not an issue. I didn’t have any issues so there was nothing to improve. We were satisfied with the doctors treatment.

My consultation experience was good. Previously I visited many hospitals, so many doctors but they didn’t respond properly. When it comes to this doctor, he talks very nicely, he gave a suggestion about what we have to do, what treatment I need to take, he explained clearly about my problem. I had a spinal cord problem so I visited many hospitals but they said to do the operation but this doctor told me that there is no need of operation for now taking medicines we will see later. He gave a lot of time for the consultation, ** **** **** ********** I would recommend the doctor to my friends. I am very happy with the explanation of my health issue. My only concern when it comes to improvement is the consultation fee as it is bit high.

We have visited for our sister-in-law, my mom has been treated and in-laws as well had an issue with the back so visited him. He actually gives functional treatment we didn't have any issues in fact we have been visiting him in kammanahalli and got to know he is now working in Vikram hospital.Vikram has a good reputation in our family, **** ******* *** a good hospital make a perfect combination. *** ****** ** ********* ** **** he treated my mom and my sister-in-law for back pain we didn't have any problem he has been like a family doctor. He is very articulate and his diagnosis and the way he gives us medicines is good. I always do recommend the doctor. I would rate the doctor 5/5.The one issue need to improve is as most people come back with the feedback is consultation fees is quite expensive in Vikram Hospital but then we didn’t have any issue ******* *** ********* *** *** ********* ** ****** *****

I have been consulting the doctor from the past 10-12 years. The doctor is attentive, listens to patients'' problems and gives suitable solutions. *** ************ **** *** ******* ***** ******** *********** ******* *** prescribes tablets that suits the patient''s body. His behaviour with the patients is excellent and I would definitely recommend this doctor to my family and friends.

The experience was very good with the doctor. I had some small pain in my knee so I Consulted the doctor, he did listen to our problem. I would recommend the doctor to others. He was good, his behaviour was good with patients. Hospital people has their own rules but the doctor is ok. I'm satisfied with the doctor and consultation.
